name: Spiritwater Blend Shampoo, Jibril
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Game》 characters and this card, and exchange them as 【STAND】.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavor_text: It gives hair a soft and silky smooth finish!

name: BLANK, Sora & Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower character with level equal to or lower than your level and with "Sora(空)" or "Shiro(白)" in its card name, put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Sora: "I told you there was no chance we'd lose, didn't I?"

name: BLANK's Victory Condition, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Super Healthy Space" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: We'll start by conquering the world.

name: Imanity's Representative, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Overthrowing A God" is in your climax area, you may put the bottom card of your stock into your waiting room. If that card is level 3 or higher, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: When it comes to video games, you can use any cheats or tool assists you want.

name: Rebirthed World, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters you have.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Now, about this little favor of mine…

name: Detected Deceit, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Game》 character or an event card, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, this card gets +2 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Trickery like that... Even cheating has its limits.

name: Existence-Robbing Game, Sora
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "Reunion with Brother, Shiro" get +1 soul.

【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When a climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Game》 character or an event card, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Shiro: "I should've come sooner…"

name: Cold Reading, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, and put them on the top of his or her deck in the original order.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Checkmate" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, choose 1 character on your center stage, and that character gets the following 2 abilities until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck." "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put all your characters into your waiting room."
flavor_text: I've learned the tricks of your games, and here's your chance to wipe my memory.

name: First Move, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, your opponent declares 0 or 1 or 2 or 3. Put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and if that card's level is the number your opponent declared, draw up to X cards. X is equal to the number your opponent declared +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: I'll be blunt: Hand over this library.

name: Election Battle Winner, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Game》 character, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: ...I feel like that took a really long time.

name: Adolescent Sora
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Game》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Promise Between the Two" is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavor_text: Shiro: "...a boy who was seven years older than her…"

name: Declaration of War, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: As of now, our country of Elkia shall reach out to all other countries… to declare war!

name: Communication Error, Sora
ability: 【CONT】 If you do not have another "Psyche Breakdown, Shiro", this card cannot attack.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Psyche Breakdown, Shiro", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
【AUTO】 When your other "Psyche Breakdown, Shiro" is put into your waiting room from the stage, put this card into your waiting room.
flavor_text: SHIIIIRRROOOOOOO!!

name: Divulging the Trick, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 cost 1 or higher character in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on an open position of his or her back stage.
flavor_text: Because in a video game where you're the game master, you can cheat to your heart's content!

name: Creator of Disboard, Tet
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Game》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: But they're coming. Coming to my very doorstep.

name: Objection! Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's level 2 or higher characters, and that character gets -1 soul until end of turn.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Objection! I object!

name: Memory Sharing, Sora
ability: 【CONT】 Memory If "Peas in a Pod" is in your memory, this card gets +5000 power and +1 soul.
flavor_text: Of course you will. You're human, too.

name: Rock-Paper-Scissors
ability: Play a Game with your opponent.

【REPLAY】 Play a Game Declare that you will play "Paper", and play "Rock-Paper-Scissors" with your opponent 1 time. If you win with "Paper", draw up to 4 cards. If you tie with "Paper" or win with "Rock" or "Scissors", draw up to 2 cards. If you lose or tie with "Rock" or "Scissors", put this card into your clock. (You may play hand signs other than "Paper")
flavor_text: Yeah. But… I'll only play paper.

name: BLANK Doesn't Know Defeat
ability: 【COUNTER】 If you have 1 character with "Sora(空)" in its card name and 1 character with "Shiro(白)" in its card name, choose 1 of your characters with "Steph(ステフ)" in its card name, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, choose 1 level 3 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text: It's about time for me to school you. You will learn how weak you really are.

name: Overthrowing A God
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavor_text: Sora & Shiro: "Defeat Tet."

name: Checkmate
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavor_text: I'll throw in all of Imanity. I'll bet our Race Piece!

name: Super Healthy Space
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)
flavor_text: Noooo!

name: Fil Nilvalen
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character on any position of your back stage.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavor_text: I'll do my best for you, Kurami～!

name: Unbelievably Cute, Izuna
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Game》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters on your back stage.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Next time, I ain't gonna lose. Thanks!!

name: Kurami Zell
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "The Promise Long Ago" is in your climax area, you may put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavor_text: You can think all you want, but it won't change your hand.

name: Innocent, Izuna
ability: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power.

【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Sora and Shiro. Thanks.

name: Tantrum, Kurami
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a climax, this card gets -3000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: You may have known me since I was a baby, but could you please stop treating me like a kid?

name: Ino Hatsuse
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, and put them on the top of his or her deck in the original order.

【AUTO】 When you use "Accelerate", choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck."
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: ...We've been awaiting you.

name: Cool Character, Kurami
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "The Final Piece" is in your climax area, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: I-I don't cry! I've never cried!

name: Eastern Federation Ambassador, Izuna
ability: 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavor_text: Why are you assholes touching me? Thanks.

name: Precious Presence, Fil
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When "The Promise Long Ago" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and move it to another open position of his or her stage.
flavor_text: Kurami cries just as soon as I take my eyes off of her, so I want to stay by her side.

name: Limits of Endurance, Kurami
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power.
【AUTO】 [(2)] When you level up, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: I took it serious! I didn't sell anyone short!

name: Grudge of Antiquity, Fil
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Bond/"Cool Character, Kurami" [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Cool Character, Kurami" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: Okay, I forgive you～!

name: Warbeasts' Representative, Shrine Priestess
ability: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 character in your hand with level equal to or lower than your level, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: You all seem to be having a good time. Mind if I join you?

name: Little Warbeast Girl, Izuna
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use "Accelerate", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 0 or lower, put it on the top or at the bottom of your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Ino: "Forgive me for the wait. This is the Eastern Federation's ambassador to Elkia: Izuna Hatsuse."

name: Bathing, Kurami
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in the original order.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Peas in a Pod" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: ...Clothes first, I think.

name: Power Beyond Physical Limits, Izuna
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Blood Destruction" is in your climax area, and your hand has 5 or less cards, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Very, very interesting. Thanks!

name: Inherently Innocent, Izuna
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Docile Reaction" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand." Then, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Game》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavor_text: Hm?

name: Obsession With Victory, Izuna
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card’s battle opponent is higher than your opponent’s level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, you may put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavor_text: Sora: "So then, this is her real cheat?!"

name: Unrelenting Assault, Izuna
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Game》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavor_text: You don't gotta tell me. Thanks.

name: Humanity's Potential, Fil
flavor_text: Of course～

name: Superior Magic User, Fil
ability: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)

name: Memory Sharing, Kurami
ability: 【CONT】 Memory If "Peas in a Pod" is in your memory, this card gets +1000 power and +1 soul.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: I'll believe... in the potential of humanity.

name: Elf Conspirator, Fil
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets -1 level on the stage.
【CONT】 If you do not have another character with "Kurami(クラミ―)" in its card name, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase.
flavor_text: Kurami: "Why don't you just leave… Miss Elf Conspirator?"

name: Adolescent Kurami
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each of your other "Precious Presence, Fil" on your back stage.
flavor_text: Fil: "Let's eat together."

name: Humanity's Potential, Kurami
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of 《Game》 characters you have is 4 or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Humanity's Potential, Fil" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavor_text: Will you help me?

name: Peas in a Pod
ability: Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Game》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
Put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: Waaaaaahhhh!

name: The Promise Long Ago
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 2 of your green characters, and those characters get +3000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Kurami: "Fi… Don't be nice to me anymore. If you treat a slave like me as a friend…"

name: The Final Piece
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavor_text: Jibril: "Now, Kurami and Master know everything about each other, and can trust each other."

name: Docile Reaction
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavor_text: Shiro: "Plus 1,050 points."

name: Blood Destruction
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Inheritor of Will, Steph
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Expert at Getting Mixed In" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal X damage to your opponent, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of "The Man Ridiculed as a Foolish King" in your memory. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: My grandfather believed in the potential of Imanity!

name: BLANK's Subordinate, Jibril
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: That is what we need in a ruler…

name: Commonsensical Hard Worker, Steph
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Let's have a match!

name: Knowledge Esteeming Race, Jibril
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, you may put the top card of your opponent's deck into your opponent's waiting room. If you do, choose 1 card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of his or her deck.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Game》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: What in this world can be more wonderful than the unknown?!

name: Only One Game, Jibril
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "True Power of Flügels" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the power of the character facing this card.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: I've had enough of this dusty old place, haven't you?

name: Pride of Power, Jibril
ability: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When "That Thing Called "Death"" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Game》 characters, and 【STAND】 it.
flavor_text: Hello there, puppy.

name: A Gift from the Former King, Steph
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "All of the Trust in Humanity" is in your climax area, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, choose up to 1 "Key of Hope" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: I want to give you something.

name: Chief of Elkia's Domestic Affairs, Steph
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavor_text: If we'd won over those last few who just showed up, we could've had a total and bloodless victory over the whole opposition.

name: True Form of the Game, Jibril
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavor_text: Sora: "Even if you erase people's memories, the fact remains that they lost."

name: Eureka! Steph
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Game》 characters get +500 power.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, if that card's trigger icon is , you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: So then, we can make her play a fair match, one without any cheating, right?!

name: Former King's Granddaughter, Steph
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "The Man Ridiculed as a Foolish King" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: I wanted to prove my grandfather was right.

name: Former Council of 18 Wings, Jibril
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters.
flavor_text: I was once a member of the Council of 18 Wings, the Avantheim government. I have a considerable degree of influence.

name: Euphoric Mood, Steph
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: No, it's fine!

name: Overflowing Self-Confidence, Jibril
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, this card gets +2000 power.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Yes. You're bound to lose, of course, but feel free to add what you like.

name: Destroyed Steph
ability: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area or your opponent's climax area, put this card into your waiting room.
flavor_text: …..I died!

name: Unstoppable Love, Steph
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "Lacking Presence, Steph" get +1000 power.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Lacking Presence, Steph", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: I'm so beau-ti-ful! ?

name: Immense Curiosity, Jibril
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Cell phone"? "Reception"?! Are those related to that plank from before?

name: Memories of Bygone Days, Jibril
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 cost 0 or lower 《Game》 character in your waiting room, put it on any position of your stage, and at the end of turn, put that character into your memory.
flavor_text: Ah! I remember the ancient war!

name: Lacking Presence, Steph
flavor_text: I've finally found you!

name: Flügel in the Library, Jibril
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +50 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Sora & Shiro: "That ruined it."

name: Loyalty and Devotion, Jibril
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Game》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Sora: "We will need the knowledge that you've spent millennia acquiring!"

name: Form of the Defeated, Steph
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Game》 characters, you may choose 1 《Game》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavor_text: ...Just what is going on?

name: Materialization Word Chain
ability: If you do not have "Materialization Word Chain" in your memory, put this card into your memory.
【AUTO】 Memory At the beginning of the climax phase, if this card is in your memory, Play a Game with your opponent.
【AUTO】 Memory At the end of your opponent's turn, if this card is in your memory, put this card into your waiting room.

【REPLAY】 Play a Game The turn player declares 0 or 1 or 2 or 3. If you or your opponent has a character with that level, put all of your characters and your opponent's characters with that level into their waiting room. Otherwise, all players choose 1 character with that level in their waiting room, and put it on any position of their stage.
flavor_text: You are feeble humans. I will enjoy this just shy of letting you die.

name: Key of Hope
ability: If you do not have a character with "Sora(空)" or "Shiro(白)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand.

Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the revealed cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: Grandfather... what is this key for...?

name: The Man Ridiculed as a Foolish King
ability: Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. Put this card into your memory.
【CONT】 Memory During your turn, if this card is in your memory, all of your 《Game》 characters get +500 power.
flavor_text: My granddaughter, the weak must use their wisdom to defeat the strong. That is the hope of humanity… of humanity... of--

name: Expert at Getting Mixed In
ability: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect.
(【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavor_text: Ahhh!

name: All of the Trust in Humanity
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Grandfather… Grandfather…

name: True Power of Flügels
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: The difference between us is a wall no Imanity can overcome.

name: That Thing Called "Death"
ability: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect.
(【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavor_text: Jibril: "Throw every cheat you've got at me. Embarrass yourself to your heart's content."

name: Imanity's Representative, Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: BLANK isn't going to lose to any of those...

name: Two Become One, Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Welcome, Gamer" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, draw up to 1 card, and this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 《Game》 characters from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavor_text: Brother... talked to Izuna-tan afterward…

name: Prodigy of Ingenuity, Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavor_text: Sora: "…Shiro"

name: Only We Can Know, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Affection-Loaded Piece" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Game》 character, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it on the top or at the bottom of your stock, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: ...Brother, you're amazing...! No one would figure this out...

name: The Ten Pledges, Tet
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character with "Sora(空)" and 1 character with "Shiro(白)" in its card name in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
flavor_text: Yes: I won't let you quit while you're ahead. Next time, I'LL win.

name: Adolescent War God, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: ...All forces, assist the red queen's troops...

name: Rebirthed World, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 If "BLANK, Sora & Shiro" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, return up to 2 cards from the top of your stock into your hand, choose an equal number of cards in your hand, and put it into your stock in any order.
【AUTO】 When your opponent uses an 【ACT】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Word Chain Battle, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Game》 characters get +500 power.
【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Super Healthy Space" is placed on your climax area, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Sora: "Materialization Word Chain?"

name: Alone in the Morning, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character with "Sora(空)" in its card name, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase.
【AUTO】 When your other 《Game》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Brother...! Come out, Brother... Don't leave me alone...!

name: Sudden Surprise Strike, Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it at the bottom of his or her deck.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: ...That's dirty...

name: What's This? Shiro
ability: 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 card in your hand, and put it at the bottom of your stock.
flavor_text: Now that's just odd!

name: Psyche Breakdown, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 If you do not have another "Communication Error, Sora", this card cannot attack.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Communication Error, Sora", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
【AUTO】 When your other "Communication Error, Sora" is put into your waiting room from the stage, put this card into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Brother...! Where are you...?

name: Boring Challenge, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each marker underneath this card.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at the top card of your deck, put it face down underneath this card as a marker, and 【REST】 this card.
flavor_text: ...Snooze...

name: Adolescent Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each of your other "Adolescent Shiro" on your center stage.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Promise Between the Two" is in your climax area, draw up to 1 card, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock.
flavor_text: ...You really... are empty...

name: Trophy, Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Game》 characters you have ×1000.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Game》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: Steph: "What?!"

name: Intrinsic Genius
ability: If you do not have a character with "Shiro(白)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand.
Look at up to 6 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it on the top or at the bottom of your stock, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: ...Brother. I learned it.

name: Accelerated Alacrity
ability: Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 《Game》 characters, and 【REST】 it. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Game》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Sora: "I'm counting on you, Shiro. We couldn't finish this at the start, so now we'll have to wing it."

name: Welcome, Gamer
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text: Sora: "We leave it to the strong to fight each other head-on."

name: Affection-Loaded Piece
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: And one… Everything I am…

name: Promise Between the Two
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Shiro: "...Just like I promised. I'll follow you anywhere..."

name: Visitor from Another World, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Game》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I'm gonna challenge God. Could anyone sane do that?

name: For Imanity's Sake, Kurami
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets -2 level while on the stage.
【AUTO】 When your other 《Game》character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: You want us to spy for you, right?

name: Lady of House Nilvalen, Fil
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Everyone can just call me Fi～

name: Erroneous Expression, Izuna
ability: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】.
flavor_text: Get back to it already. Thanks.

name: Elkia's Backbone, Steph
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Game》 characters get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: This country could already be doomed, huh?

name: Affectionate Respect for Her Master, Jibril
ability: 【CONT】 Memory If "Materialization Word Chain" is in your memory, this card gets +2 level and +8000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your hand has less cards than your opponent's hand, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavor_text: I have zero interest in Imanity other than my masters.

name: Visitor from Another World, Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's soul ×1000.
flavor_text: Brother said... we've always won the game before it's started...

name: Game God, Tet
ability: 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《Game》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: It seems I wasn't mistaken to bring you two here!

name: Challenge to the Flügels, Shiro & Steph
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Game》 characters get +500 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character in your waiting room with "Sora" or "Shiro" in its card name, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Shiro: "Wow!"

name: Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavor_text: Yup. Sure enough, this makes me feel most relaxed.

name: Swindle, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, your opponent declares 0 or 1 or 2 or 3. Reveal the top card of your deck, and if that card is a character of the level that your opponent declared, put it on any position of your stage. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavor_text: And what would that be?

name: One Half of BLANK, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: There's only a 1 in 650,000 chance--!

name: Battle Orders, Sora
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters revealed among those cards ×1000.
flavor_text: Cavalry Squad 2! Don't waste the chance the pawns have given you!

name: Genius Gamer Siblings, Sora
flavor_text: We're siblings, so this isn't weird at all…

name: Provocative Challenger, Sora
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Spy Wipeout, Sora
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Game》 characters get +1000 power.
【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 1 《Game》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Okay, here goes.

name: Grandmaster, Sora
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Game》 characters.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, choose one of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play event cards and "Backup" from your hand."
flavor_text: For now, I guess we'll sit out a few turns and see how things go, huh?

name: Power of the Pledges
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: Steph: "No! This isn't right!"

name: Welcome to Disboard
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavor_text: Sora & Shiro: "This game is TOTAL crap!"

name: Genius Gamer Siblings, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "Genius Gamer Siblings, Sora" get +2000 power.

【AUTO】 Bond/"Genius Gamer Siblings, Sora" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Genius Gamer Siblings, Sora" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: ...Brother rejected me...

name: Objection! Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Game》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavor_text: If you become king… you can make a harem.

name: One Half of BLANK, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: Aschente!

name: Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters you have ×500.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Coronation" is in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Game》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavor_text: ...It's cheating.

name: Communication Error, Shiro
ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock]".
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text: Brother!

name: Invitation to Another World, Tet
ability: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: Everything in this world is decided by straightforward games. People's lives... even national borders!

name: Unhealthy Invitation, Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Game》 characters you have ×1000.
flavor_text: ...Brother… Congratulations on losing your virginity.

name: Grandmaster, Shiro
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Game》 characters you have ×1000.
【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Chess is no different... from tic-tac-toe.

name: Counter Offensive
ability: Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Game》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Sora: "Even without fighting...you can win!"

name: Coronation
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
